alfredsnippet.snippet:
Dr. Spencer Weart directs the Center for History of Physics at the American Institute of Physics in New York. In his interesting article The Physicist as Mad Scientist published in Physics Today, he writes:

"The public image of the scientist partly evolved out of ideas about wizards. Here was an impressive figure, known to all from early childhood, reaching back through ancient sorcery legends to prehistoric shamans."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Scientists as Wizards
